resource.string: USIM modifier Version %d.%d for Python 3, (C)2018 Hsu Chih-Ming
Error!! Can't detected any smart card readers.
Error!! Can't detetced the smart card.
Type 'exit' to exit, 'plugin' for summary of suppotred plugins.
PIN1 Enabled: %s, PIN1 Verified: %s, ADM Key Verified: %s
Type '[plugin name] help' for more information about the plugin.
Please input ADM Key (16 digits, Hexadecimal), press ENTER key to skip:
Please input PIN1 Code (4 ~ 8 digits, Decimal):
ADM Key verify fail, remaining %d times
